text: Planner Problems . "+ Need to improve costing for Parallel Bitmap Heap Scan | (ignores lossification). * Need to investigate cost of Bitmap Heap Scan vs. Bitmap Index Scan. * Need to improve costing for HashAggregate (sometimes picked even when Gather Merge + GroupAggregate executes faster). * Need to improve selectivity estimation (some estimaies | â€˜ are very, very bad). * Need to improve algorithm for selecting the # of workers.
